ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.021: Azores, Terceira, E coast, Porto Martins, S side of bay; 38°41'N 27°03'W; rocky shore, stones, sponges and algae; shore-collecting; 30.ix.1979
CANCAP-VI, Sta. 6.066: Cape Verde Islands, SW of Boa Vista; 15°53'N 23°00'W; depth 53 m, sand, calcareous algae and shell gravel; van Veen grab; 13.vi.1982
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.033: Azores, E of Santa Maria; 36°59'N 25°02'W; depth 35 m, fine sand with shell gravel; van Veen grab; 28.v.1981
Sta. MAU.002: Mauritania, Baie de Cansado; 20°53'N 17°02'W; depth 8 m, anoxic fine mud; van Veen grab; 5.vi.1988
AV.610409: France, dep. Var, La Capte (= 6 km SSE of Hyeres); 9.iv.1961
Sta. MAU.079: Mauritania, off Banc d'Arguin; 20°01'N 17°23'W; depth 53 m, dark-grey muddy fine sand, tubeworms, ophiurids, Tellina; van Veen grab; 14.vi.1988
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.101: Canary Islands, E of Lanzarote; 29°06'N 13°26'W; depth 308-330 m, brown clay; van Veen grab; 22.v.1980
